TitleEnglish: DAKAICHI -I'm Being Harassed By The Sexiest Man Of The Year- Movie: Spain
SummaryEnglish: Higashiya and Takato have decided to co-star in the two-person play "Blood Wedding" that incorporates flamenco. Although Takato works hard on the stage practice, he realizes the difference in talent with Higashiya while practicing flamenco. So Takato decided to fly to Spain to learn "passion". On the other hand, Higashiya isn't over a person he knew in the past.
Aliases: DAKAICHI -I'm Being Harassed By The Sexiest Man Of The Year- Movie
Dakaretai Otoko 1-i ni Odosarete Imasu. Movie: Spain-hen
Dakaretai Otoko 1-i ni Odosarete Imasu. Movie
